resources.string: First screen. A menu with 3 options: Artists, Albums, Songs. Artists: opens a screen with a list of all artists that are in the phone. Album: opens a screen (intent) with a list of all albums that are in your phone. Songs: opens a screen with a list of all songs saved in your phone.

This intent shows a list of all the artists in your phone (with their picture). When the name of the artist is clicked, a new screen is opened with the list of all their songs saved in the phone showing also the artist\'s picture and name.There are also two menu buttons. The app would use the Media Player API to play and restore the songs

This screen is very similar to the artists\'s screen. Shows a list of all the albums in your phone (with their cover image). When the name of the album is clicked, a new screen should open it with the list of the album\'s songs.There are also two menu buttons. The app would use the Media Player API to play and restore the songs

In this intent there is shown a list of all songs in your phone. Song\'s name followed by the singer\'s name. When the name of a song is clicked, the song would start to play. There are also two menu buttons for navigation purposes. The app would use the Media Player API to play and restore the songs.

In this screen is displayed a singer\'s photo with their name and a list of all their songs stored in the phone. When the name of a song is clicked, the song would start to play. There are also two menu buttons for navigation purposes. The app would use the Media Player API to play and restore the songs.
